main.name: Ryan MacFarlane
main.bio: I am a junior web developer with an eye for UI/UX design, and experience in React.js, Ruby on Rails, Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, SASS, and more.
main.contactmessage: Interested in working together? Let's talk.

education.description: In addition to learning important frameworks like React.js, Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and others, Lighthouse Labs helped me discover talents I didn't know I had, such as UI/UX design, project planning and management, and team building techniques.
At Robertson college I learned about the importance of precision work, best practices for securing patient data and protecting confidentiality as well as business and medical ethics.

work.title: Entrepreneur extraordinaire
work.description: Specializing in data recovery, virus removal, performance optimization, and thwarting ransomware attacks, Blue Sky Digital is a tech-support side hustle I've been running for over a decade, helping clients recover everything from lost passwords to wedding photos and critical documents.

work.title: Senior Sales Representative
work.description: Representing the finest and most pristigious name in piano craftsmanship, it was my professional responsibility and delight to counsel world-class artists in the selection and personalization of their Steinway & Sons piano, as well as assist innumeral clients in selecting the perfect instrument for their home.

projects.title: Reflexion
projects.category: Machine learning puts the power of yoga in your hands. Built with React.

projects.title: Jungle
projects.category: An e-commerce site built with Ruby on Rails

projects.title: Interview Scheduler
projects.category: React-based webapp for connecting mentors and students.

projects.title: Tweeter
projects.category: A Twitter clone using JQuery and Dry Humour.

testimonials.text: The difference between the impossible and the possible is a matter of personal determination.
I'm a great believer in luck, and I find that the harder I work, the more I have of it.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favour.
